## Advanced

### Download via curl using the command line

```shell
{% for db in coll.sketches -%}
{% for dbfile in db.files -%}
# download {{dbfile.basename}}
curl -O --no-clobber {{ dbfile.download_url }}

{% endfor -%}
{% endfor -%}
```

### A list of all the URLs

```
{% for db in coll.sketches -%}
{% for dbfile in db.files -%}
{{ dbfile.download_url }}
{% endfor -%}
{% endfor -%}
```
